kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
No, it doesn't provide the consent level for you.
Instead, it lets you [make a client-side call](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-tag-manager?tab=readme-ov-file#quick-start) that will request and auto-add the tags that match the consents the visitor has agreed to.
This would be used when you have dialogs or some other client-side UX for agreeing to consents that doesn't cause a page reload.
If a providing more context (like consent level) would make the integration more useful, file an issue 👍.
